Class Enemy

java.lang.Object
  greenfoot.Actor
      Collision
          Enemy

public abstract class Enemy
extends Collision

Abstract Supercalss for all of the enemies each person has designed.
Each person will have to create an enemy, based on their own AI. The act method is already preset so don't worry about that!

Each subclass constructor will have to contain a "super(insert_health_point);"

Each team member is required (aside from Jerry who is designing the boss and enemies of course) to create 2 methods - randomMove() and attackMove(). They must be PROTECTED methods. Any other wording, naming, convention, etc will result in an error. randomMove() must also cotain a setLocation(x_Location, y_Location);

Version:
1.2
Author:
David Liu and Jerry Xu and Keith Wong (sounds)
